ygData.subject: Re: Spells In General
ygData.msgSnippet: You ll need to remember the other class that we share some skills/spells with, which are clerics. Check out that guild too. ... From: Rodney Miller
ygData.messageBody:
You'll need to remember the other class that we share some skills/spells
with, which are clerics. Check out that guild too.

-----Original Message-----
From: Rodney Miller [mailto:RMiller@...]
Sent: Friday, April 30, 1999 9:08 AM
To: 'eqpaladin@onelist.com'
Subject: [eqpaladin] Re: Spells In General


From: Rodney Miller <RMiller@...>

Myself and another paladin in Freeport were curious about our spells
that we
can cast.

I realize that there are a number of "canned" spells that we can cast
that
are purchased at our guild. I have all of these that I am able to cast
at
this time. However, are there spells that we can pick up from other
towns/shops etc. that we can cast also? Or are we limited to what we
can
purchase from the Guild? I went over to the necromancer's guild and
looked
through all of the spells that they were selling and most of them said
that
I couldn't use the spell. Just curious about this.

Grod
11th Level Paladin
Innoruuk Server
